sentence.text: We show that the extent of multicellular organism development heterogeneity is positively associated with the size of biopsied focal lesions consistent with regional outgrowth of advanced clones.

We demonstrate multicellular organism development genomic heterogeneity in more than 75% of patients, including inactivation of regulation of cyclin-dependent protein serine/threonine kinase activity and TP53, and mutations affecting mitogen-activated protein kinase genes.

entity.text: regulation of cyclin-dependent protein serine/threonine kinase activity
